_comment: State tracking file for archived projects. Projects are moved here from specs/state.json when completed and archived.

completed_projects.description: Research how the orchestrator should execute command file workflow_execution stages. Analyze current orchestrator delegation mechanism, identify why command file stages are not being executed, compare with OpenAgents architecture (tasks 240-247), and design solution for parsing and executing workflow_execution stages including stage sequencing, context passing, error handling, and rollback mechanisms.
